title: Become a Mogul: 7 Major Success Principles For The Urban Entrepreneur
description: Have you ever felt there was more to your life than your current circumstances? Do you have a passion that is burning deep inside of you and don't know how to let it out? Do you have the desire for greatness? Do you want to learn how to make a difference while generating a substantial income? You have found your answer!!! Become a Mogul makes the process of becoming a mogul easy to understand and easy to follow. Charles has studied the lives and careers of today's biggest moguls for over ten years and has helped his clients implement their strategies and principles with staggering results. This book will walk you through the process of becoming a mogul step by step and give you the tools you can use to instill positive change at every level of your organization. This book takes you step by step through the process of remodeling your life and becoming a mogul. The mission of this book is to teach Urban Entrepreneurs from all walks of life that it is truly possible to have everything you ever wanted by following seven very simple concepts and easy to understand principles. This book is the cornerstone that you need to reach the level of success that you are destined to reach. After reading this book, you'll have all the necessary tools to reach mogul status.
author: Charles  Major
